name: Jester's Helper
description:
The king wanted good jokes and you told a pretty rotten one, now your neck is at risk! Collect all the cherries before the executioners catch you.

CONTROLS

KeyboardWASD
ArrowsMove
CTRL
ZGrab / Drop barrel
Spacebar
XKick barrel (if grabbed)

Q
EnterPause / ConfirmGamepadD-padMove
A buttonGrab / Drop barrel
B buttonKick barrel (if grabbed)
Start button Pause / Confirm
